verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy Virgin, by God’s decree,
you were called eternally;
That he could give
his Son to our race.
Mary, we praise you,
hail, full of grace.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
By your faith
and loving accord,
as the handmaid of the Lord,
you undertook God’s
plan to embrace.
Mary we thank you,
hail, full of grace.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Refuge for your
children so weak,
sure protection all can seek.
Problems of life
you help us to face.
Mary, we trust you,
hail, full of grace.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
To our needy
world of today love
and beauty you portray,
showing the path
to Christ we must trace.
Mary, our mother,
hail, full of grace.
